be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.project

Class ProjectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.application.controllers.project.ProjectController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NewTagViewController.Listener, ProjectViewController.Listener

    public class ProjectController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProjectViewController.Listener, NewTagViewController.Listener
    ProjectController handles the ProjectViewController logic, CRUD of a project.

        Update a parent/sub project.
        Parameters:
        projectTitle - the new title
        projectDescription - the new description
        endDate - the new endDate
        projectParent - the project parent if it exists, null otherwise
        color - the project color
        checkedTags - the new tags to add
        uncheckedTags - the unchecked tags to remove
